channel.title: Mailing list way to post/subsribe to specific categary?
channel.description: I am interested in mainly one topic/categary and wanted to know if there was a way to post via mailing list directly to a categary? (eg AppArmor)

item.title: Mailing list way to post/subsribe to specific categary?
item.dc:creator: jbwihokkc
item.description:
That could work, I was hoping for a simple mailing list but this is fine, not complaining!

Thx for the response/clarification (and a supurb OS!)

Read full topic
item.source: Mailing list way to post/subsribe to specific categary?

item.title: Mailing list way to post/subsribe to specific categary?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
We are using discourse. A popular forum software used by many.

Not a mailing list, but it is possible to subscribe on a per category or per topic case.

In every topic there should be a button o Normal You will be notified if someone mentions your @name or replies to you. that can be switched that lets you subscribe for a topic.

In every category such as https://forums.whonix.org/c/apparmor there is on the right side next to New Topic an O drop down button as well that lets you watching a category.

Does that work for you?

Read full topic
